title: Process a Customer Return (RMA)
description: A customer is returning a product they ordered by mistake. A customer service rep needs to process the return.

tasks.description: Find the original sales order to verify the purchase.
Create an RMA for the return, noting the reason as 'Ordered in Error'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an RMA number and return instructions for the customer.

tasks.description: Inform the customer that a credit will be issued once the returned item is received and inspected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the return and credit process to the customer.
